channel.title: Help me in cracking this
channel.description:
Hello. I need some help :D
I am supposed to crack the authentication algorithm used in SIM cards - called comp128 V2 . It is used in authenticating your sim with the network using SIM secret key ( and getting this key is my target :D ). V1 of this algorithm was cracked long ago (before 2002) but it is useless now in 2018 :D I have no previous experience in cryptanlysis( But for sure I have in programming :D ) but I was to do it my self as I FOUND NO ATTACK ON THIS VERSION AS NO ONE CARES NOW ABOUT 2G :(
My questions that I hope to get answers. 1- The only thing I had is a good understand of the code, What should I do next to break it ? (some advises may help )
2- Does anyone know on dark/deep web any forums,websites,blogs,...etc which may help in this? ( hacking but on communications systems(2G,..etc), IMSI catchers and hardware not normal exploits,..etc stuff.) and can if they need invitation someone give me one :D
Code ( if any one cares about it ): https://gist.github.com/vanhoefm/39347363856b46087ce8 Target: I have input ( Nonce ) and output and I need the second input (Key)

item.title: Help me in cracking this
item.dc:creator: BlackSteelCannon
item.description:
Hello. I need some help

I am supposed to crack the authentication algorithm used in SIM cards - called comp128 V2 . It is used in authenticating your sim with the network using SIM secret key ( and getting this key is my target ). V1 of this algorithm was cracked long ago (before 2002) but it is useless now in 2018
I have no previous experience in cryptanlysis( But for sure I have in programming ) but I was to do it my self as I FOUND NO ATTACK ON THIS VERSION AS NO ONE CARES NOW ABOUT 2G

My questions that I hope to get answers.
1- The only thing I had is a good understand of the code, What should I do next to break it ? (some advises may help )

2- Does anyone know on dark/deep web any forums,websites,blogs,…etc which may help in this? ( hacking but on communications systems(2G,…etc), IMSI catchers and hardware not normal exploits,…etc stuff.) and can if they need invitation someone give me one

Code ( if any one cares about it ):

gist.github.com

https://gist.github.com/vanhoefm/39347363856b46087ce8

comp128.c

#include <stdlib.h>
#include <time.h>
